tags.name: openapi
tags.description: methods that query for generated OpenAPI specifications

get.summary: get all Slurm tracked license info

post.summary: submit new job allocation without any steps that must be signaled to stop

delete.summary: send signal to list of jobs

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific account

parameters.name: job_name
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific name

parameters.name: partition
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific partition

parameters.name: qos
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific QOS

parameters.name: reservation
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific reservation

parameters.name: job_state
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific state

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific numeric user id

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific user name

parameters.name: wckey
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a specific wckey

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Filter jobs to a set of nodes

get.description: This endpoint may return multiple job entries since job_id is not a unique key - only the tuple (cluster, job_id, start_time) is unique. If the requested job_id is a component of a heterogeneous job all components are returned.

requestBody.description: TRES descriptions. Only works in developer mode.
Description of QOS to add or update

parameters.name: with_raw_qos
parameters.description: return a raw qos or delta_qos

parameters.name: without_parent_limits
parameters.description: don't give me limits from parents

number.description: If set is True the number will be set with value. Otherwise ignore number contents.
